title: Meowgical Black Cat Memes for Witches Waiting for HBO's Harry Potter
description: There's something undeniably enchanted about black cats. Mysterious, majestic, and just the right amount of mischievous - these feline familiars have been keeping witches company since before Merlin had a beard. In the wizarding world, black cats aren't just pets - they're trusted companions, magical allies, and occasional troublemakers (looking at you, Crookshanks).Honestly, if Professor McGonagall ever took a sabbatical, we wouldn't be surprised if a black cat took over Transfiguration class and taught it better. Need a warning before a Slytherin prank? A black cat will sense it. Lost your wand again? They've probably hidden it for fun.Fluff. Chaos. Drama! Our weekly cat newsletter has it all - subscribe here.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: Meowgical Black Cat Memes for Witches Waiting for HBO's Harry Potter - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: And while some Muggles still believe in the whole “bad luck” nonsense, real witches and wizards know the truth: black cats are pure magic. Whether they’re staring into the void like they’ve just seen a dementor, knocking over your potions shelf, or napping like they’ve downed a full bottle of Felix Felicis, these cats are iconic.So hop on your broomstick, grab a Butterbeer, and prepare for a purrfectly bewitching scroll through some spellbinding black cat memes. Mischief managed. When you're the weird girl who's chosen by a black cat - that's the Cat Distribution System signaling you that you're a witch. Congrats, your Hogwarts letter will arrive very soon. Black cats are not bad luck. Black cats are the purest magic, the purriest cuties, and the best luck anyone could ask for themselves. That's your sign to adopt a silly little black cat, for a good luck.
html:
And while some Muggles still believe in the whole “bad luck” nonsense, real witches and wizards know the truth: black cats are pure magic. Whether they’re staring into the void like they’ve just seen a dementor, knocking over your potions shelf, or napping like they’ve downed a full bottle of Felix Felicis, these cats are iconic.

So hop on your broomstick, grab a Butterbeer, and prepare for a purrfectly bewitching scroll through some spellbinding black cat memes. Mischief managed.

When you're the weird girl who's chosen by a black cat - that's the Cat Distribution System signaling you that you're a witch. Congrats, your Hogwarts letter will arrive very soon.

Black cats are not bad luck. Black cats are the purest magic, the purriest cuties, and the best luck anyone could ask for themselves. That's your sign to adopt a silly little black cat, for a good luck.
